text: The University of Toledo is a public university in Toledo, Ohio. The University of Toledo's athletic team's are called the Rockets and there are 15 varsity teams including: Football, Basketball, distance running as well as others. Their rival is the Bowling Green Falcons and they fight over the "Peace Pipe" trophy. ==References== * ==Other websites== Category:Colleges and universities in Ohio Category:Toledo, Ohio Category:Mid-American Conference Category:1872 establishments in the United States Category:1870s establishments in Ohio
title: University of Toledo
